name: Hacker News Dark
description: This style attempts to preserve the default view while being easier on the eyes. Neither the font styles nor the size and position of any elements on the page are affected.
additional_info: The repository containing the CSS can be found at GitHub, so feel free to make fixes and submit pull requests as needed. Change Log (dd/mm/yyyy): 2021/05/11: Merge pull request from viniciusCamargo: fix visibility of vote arrows 2015/08/29: Added selector for dark footer text 2015/08/08: Merge pull request from Farow: invert colors of the upvote image 2015/07/25: Fixed dark comment text against dark background
